summary: This document is a certificate of existence for Zorro Management, LLC, issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands. It confirms that the company was duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands and has met all necessary requirements as of the date of issuance.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter certifies the existence of Zorro Management, LLC, confirming its organization and compliance with local laws.

keyFacts: Zorro Management, LLC was organized on December 14, 2016.
The company is in good standing and has paid all applicable fees.
No Articles of Termination have been filed for the company.
